name: The Bat Brew
description: A carefully roasted house blend with notes of dark chocolate and caramel — perfect for lingering mornings.

name: Midnight Mocha
description: Rich espresso blended with dark chocolate and steamed milk — a decadent treat for chocolate lovers.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Bold espresso layered with velvety steamed milk and finished with a rich caramel drizzle — a smooth, sweet pick-me-up for caramel enthusiasts.

name: Cold Brew
description: Slow-steeped coffee served chilled for a clean, bold flavor — a refreshing choice with smooth, low-acid richness.

name: Americano
description: Freshly brewed espresso diluted with hot water — bold clarity and a crisp finish.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Vibrant ceremonial-grade matcha whisked into silky steamed milk — an earthy, energizing blend with a naturally calming finish.

name: Red Velvet Muffin
description: Moist red velvet muffin with a hint of cocoa and cream cheese crumbs — great with any brew.

name: Nachos Grande
description: Crispy tortilla chips piled high with cheese, jalapeño, salsa, and a dollop of sour cream — perfect for groups.

name: Waffle
description: Light, fluffy waffles cooked to a golden crunch and served warm — a delightful treat for breakfast lovers.

name: Projector (per hour)
description: High-brightness projector available for bookings. Rate charged per hour.

name: Speaker & Mic (per hour)
description: Speaker and mic set available for events and study sessions — charged per hour.
